Class Nao.ALAudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.naoservice.client.Nao.ALAudioPlayer
Enclosing class:
Nao
public static final class Nao.ALAudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

This module allows to play wav and mp3 files on NAO

Actual SDK return value:True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.

play

public org.json.JSONObject play(int id)
Starts the playback of a file preloaded with the loadFile function.. Asynchronous.

Parameters:
id - Id returned by the loadFile function
Actual SDK return value: Id of the task. Can be used to interrupt it.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

play

public org.json.JSONObject play(int id,
                                float volume,
                                float pan)
Starts the playback of a file preloaded with the loadFile function, with specific volume and audio balance. Asynchronous.

Parameters:
id - Id returned by the loadFile function
volume - volume of the sound file (must be between 0.0 and 1.0)
pan - audio balance of the sound file (-1.0 : left / 1.0 : right)
Actual SDK return value: Id of the task. Can be used to interrupt it.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

playFile

public org.json.JSONObject playFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                    float volume,
                                    float pan)
Plays a wav or mp3 file, with specific volume and audio balance. Asynchronous.

Parameters:
fileName - Path of the sound file
volume - volume of the sound file (must be between 0.0 and 1.0)
pan - audio balance of the sound file (-1.0 : left / 1.0 : right / 0.0 : centered)
Actual SDK return value: Id of the task. Can be used to interrupt it.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

playFileFromPosition

                                                float position,
                                                float volume,
                                                float pan)
Plays a wav or mp3 file from a given position in the file, with specific volume and audio balance. Asynchronous.

Parameters:
fileName - Name of the sound file
position - Position in second where the playing has to begin
volume - volume of the sound file (must be between 0.0 and 1.0)
pan - audio balance of the sound file (-1.0 : left / 1.0 : right)
Actual SDK return value: Id of the task. Can be used to interrupt it.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
